body.title: 1. Empty state
body.p: In the empty state you can create a new DMN model using one of the two options:

li.p: Creates a new Decision node with an empty Decision Table.

fig.title: Decision node with a Decision Table

image.alt: new editor diagram empty state decision node

li.p: Creates a new Input Data and Decision node with an Information Requirement relationship.

image.alt: new editor diagram empty state input decision
